comments.comment:
Since his split with the UNP, lately the President has been taking very rational and constructive decisions in the best interest of the nation and the people. 

For the past four years all hell has broken loose in the country with regard to law and order - in addition to stalling the development process thus causing much concern and frustration among the people. 

At least now, under the President‚Äôs leadership, there seem to be resolutions being implemented to overcome these issues which the progressive people in the country appreciate. 

The President must now take extra precautions against any retaliatory action by any associates of these gangsters and thugs to harm him - or even by those corrupt politicians in the government who might take advantage of this situation to cause any attempts on his life; because if anything were to happen to the President, guess who will become The President?
comments.author: Dev De Silva

replies.replyComment: Well said. Totally agree with you
